com.proschedule.core.persistence.view.operation
Class OperationPresenter

java.lang.Object
  com.proschedule.core.persistence.view.operation.OperationPresenter

public class OperationPresenter
extends java.lang.Object

Faz as alterações no model de acordo com as requisições feitas pelas views do Operation.
